text: aur hum ne samoodh ki taraf un ke bhai Saaleh (alaihissalaam) ko bheja, unhone farmaaya aye meri khaum! tum Allah ki ibaadath karo, us ke siva koyi tumhaara maboodh nahi, tumhaare paas tumhaare parvardigaar ki taraf se ek waazeh daleel aa chuki hai, ye oontni hai Allah ki jo tumhaare liye daleel hai, so us ko chohd do, ke Allah taâ€™ala ki zameen mein khaati phire aur us ko buraayi ke saath haath bhi math lagaana ke kahi tum ko dard-naak azaab aa pakde
